name: Lost Among Stars
description:
Lost Among Stars
Glide through various obstacles and try to reach the finish line

Be warned, it's a hard game.

Controls : ' W ' - Middle engine, ' A ' - Left engine, ' D ' -  Right engine

You, the player, control the ship, which consists of three parts, the middle, left and right engines, none of them should be damaged too much. There is some space between them however and you should try and use that space to squeeze through some obstacles to reach the finish line more effectively.

Sometimes, each of the engines can be damaged in some way, the connection to the engine can be lost(engine ignites randomly),  they can have low connection(player input lags a bit),  or the engine can just simply not work(I don't think this needs explaining)

Installing :  unzip the file and run the " Lost among stars.exe" file.

Extra info : Made with Unity 2019.2.17f1, on Windows 7 in under 30 hours(we didn't have any ideas and were about to give up on the GameJam)

Thank you and hope you enjoy, all sorts of feedback are welcome ^-^
